about_the_game:
Arkham Detective is an immersive and captivating psychological thriller that unfolds within the eerie and otherworldly universe crafted by the master of cosmic horror, H.P. Lovecraft. Set against the haunting backdrop of the year 1919, the game plunges players into the enigmatic and foreboding City of Arkham in Massachusetts.

Embark on an intense journey as the protagonist, Joe Adams, a seasoned private detective with a keen eye for solving perplexing mysteries. As the unsolved puzzle pieces of a chilling and cryptic series of killings emerge, Adams finds himself entangled in a web of dark secrets and eldritch horrors lurking beneath the surface of Arkham.

As Joe Adams, players must navigate the twisted labyrinth of Arkham, collecting clues, interrogating suspicious characters, and piecing together the fragments of a sinister plot that threatens to unleash unimaginable cosmic horrors upon the unsuspecting city.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains blood, mutilation, legal and illegal drug use, psychological horror.
